reviewText: I relly liked this Pack it is a bit expensive but if you buy them sepert they would cost more.  now as for the Product its not for everyone as the contents can easly be considerd For better lack of words Rape but the story is enoght to make that a minour issue(it is a 18 and Older product).  Compeared to the game its still lacking but it did do a good job and considing you could only play the game in japan you don't have to worrie about that.  all the episodes come with the orignal Jap. dub and english sub. as well as English dub for at least the First two(don't like the eng. dub so only saw it for the first 2 epi.)
